author: HeidiCox
title: The most lovely decor and very helpful and friendly staff.
text:
This is one of the most adorable boutique hotels in Paris, I have stayed here several times during business trips and the friendly staff are always greeting you with open arms and will do everything to make your stay as comfortable as possible.
The decor and interior of Dimore Studio is beautiful and you really get the essence of the Paris/Milano vibe inside the hotel as well as on the street, so you get the breathtaking romantic feeling of Paris.
The staff could be better at cleaning the rooms, I wasn't always done when I asked for it - but besides that I can only recommend a stay at HÃ´tel Saint-Marc if your trip takes you to Paris.
Also, If you have the time, book an appointment for their Spa!
